law.catch_line: An appeal from a decision made under § 11-1009 of this subtitle shall be taken to the circuit court...

text.section: An appeal from a decision made under § 11-1009 of this subtitle shall be taken to the circuit court for the county in accordance with Maryland Rule 7-202.
A party aggrieved by a decision of a court under this subtitle may appeal to the Court of Special Appeals.
